name: Autocomplete Orders for WooCommerce
description: Supercharge your WooCommerce store by automatically completing orders based on your preferences. No more manual order processing - let the magic happen!
author: wplove.co

changes.description: Fixed duplicate Settings links in the plugin list
Fixed saving indicator animation loop that never ended
Made settings page fully responsive for all devices and screen sizes
Improved status notifications with better positioning and animations
Added magical 'Update Check' button to manually check for plugin updates
Fixed AJAX settings saving to actually work this time (we promise!)
Improved payment method override explanations so you'll actually know what they do
Added colorful alerts for update notifications because updates should be exciting!
Fixed Payment Verification toggle not saving correctly
Improved GitHub release workflow for better reliability
Added AJAX settings saving for instant changes without page reloads
Improved settings UI with clearer explanations of payment method overrides
Enhanced status notifications with attractive message styles
Added GitHub-based automatic updates
Consistent plugin ZIP file for easier installation
Updated plugin metadata and general improvements
Initial release with multiple autocomplete modes
Support for changing default order status by payment gateway
Payment verification with 1-minute delay option
Modern settings page with intuitive controls
Detailed order notes when actions are taken
